channel.title: Posts on Suryansh Jaiswal
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Suryansh Jaiswal

item.title: The Aspiring Product Manager's Guide to Mastering User-Centric Design in 2024
item.description:
The Aspiring Product Manager’s Guide to Mastering User-Centric Design in 2024

Introduction

In the rapidly evolving tech landscape of 2024, mastering user-centric design is more crucial than ever for aspiring product managers. This guide provides a comprehensive approach to understanding and implementing user-centric design principles to create products that truly resonate with users.

Understanding User-Centric Design

User-centric design (UCD) is a framework that places the user at the heart of the design and development process. This approach aims to tailor products to meet the specific needs and wants of users, enhancing user satisfaction and engagement.

item.title: Future-Proofing Your Product Management Career in the AI Era
item.description:
Future-Proofing Your Product Management Career in the AI Era

Introduction

The rapid evolution of Artificial Intelligence (AI) has permeated every sector of technology, reshaping how products are developed, marketed, and managed. For product managers, staying relevant in this AI-driven landscape is not just about adapting to changes but also about proactively future-proofing their careers. This blog post will explore key strategies that can help product managers thrive in the era of AI.

item.title: "Beyond the Buzz: Understanding the Impact of AI on Product Management"
item.description:
Title: Beyond the Buzz: Understanding the Impact of AI on Product Management

Introduction

The ongoing revolution in Artificial Intelligence (AI) has not spared any industry, transforming the way we work, live, and interact with products and services. One field that has experienced substantial AI-driven transformation is product management. While AI’s influence on product management is no longer just a buzzword, comprehending its impact can be vast and complex. This blog post delves into the impact of AI on product management and provides actionable insights for product managers to effectively use AI to their advantage.

item.title: "Essential Skills for Product Managers Aspiring for Senior Leadership Roles"
item.description:
Title: Essential Skills for Product Managers Aspiring for Senior Leadership Roles

Introduction: In today’s fast-paced digital landscape, being a Product Manager (PM) means more than just overseeing product development stages. It’s about strategic planning, cross-functional collaboration, understanding market needs, and offering innovative solutions. As a PM aiming for senior leadership positions, one must cultivate a unique set of skills. This blog post will discuss these essential skills that can propel you towards those coveted senior leadership roles.

item.title: "FDEs vs Product Managers: A Comparative Analysis in the Tech Industry"
item.description:
Title: FDEs vs Product Managers: A Comparative Analysis in the Tech Industry

Introduction: The technology industry is filled with jargon and complicated job titles. Two of these, Full Stack Engineers (FDEs) and Product Managers (PMs), are often misunderstood, leading to confusion about their respective roles. This blog post aims to draw a comprehensive comparison between the two, shedding light on their distinct roles, responsibilities, and the skill sets they need to succeed.

item.title: "Harnessing AI for Effective Product Management in the Physical Realm"
item.description:
Title: Harnessing AI for Effective Product Management in the Healthcare Industry

Introduction

Product management, a critical branch of business operations, is the art and science of successfully guiding the lifecycle of a product from conception to market delivery. Given the increasing complexity and competitiveness of the modern market, achieving efficiency in product management has become crucial. Fortunately, the emergence of Artificial Intelligence (AI) presents a golden opportunity to revolutionize the way we manage products. This blog post aims to delve into how AI can be harnessed for effective product management in the healthcare industry, offering actionable insights to optimize operations.

item.title: "The Future of Product Management: AI-Driven Startups"
item.description:
Title: The Future of Product Management: AI-Driven Startups

Introduction

The world of product management has been adapting and evolving with the rapid development of technology, which has seen a significant shift towards Artificial Intelligence (AI). AI has become a game changer across various sectors, and the startup world is no stranger to this transformation. This blog post discusses how AI is shaping the future of product management, particularly in startups, and provides an insight into the potential opportunities and challenges that lie ahead.

item.title: "The Quantum Leap: How Quantum Computing is Set to Revolutionize Product Management"
item.description:
Title: The Quantum Leap: How Quantum Computing is Set to Revolutionize Product Management

Introduction

When we think of the future in technology, quantum computing is one field that holds enormous promise. Capable of solving complex computational problems at speeds seemingly unimaginable today, this technology has the potential to revolutionize industries across the board. One such realm primed for disruption is that of product management. But what does quantum computing mean for product managers, and how can they prepare for this shift?

item.title: "Unraveling the Future: Will AI Surpass Human Product Managers?"
item.description:
Unraveling the Future: Will AI Surpass Human Product Managers?

As we embark on a new decade, one question continues to permeate discussions within the tech world: will artificial intelligence (AI) surpass human capability? This question is especially relevant for the role of product managers (PMs), professionals who guide the success of a product and lead the cross-functional team that’s responsible for improving it. In this blog post, we’ll explore the prospective developments and analyze whether AI can indeed take over human product managers.

item.title: Product Management Insights 2025-06-10
item.description:
Title: “Innovation Unleashed: Disruptive Strategies in Product Management”

Introduction:

In the fast-paced world of technology and business, product management has taken center stage. As products evolve, so does the art of managing them. This blog post will explore the cutting-edge strategies shaking up the world of product management, and how you can harness them in your own ventures.

Section 1: Reimagining Product Vision with Design Thinking

Design thinking is no longer a buzzword but an essential approach in product management. This strategy shifts the focus from merely producing a product to creating solutions that are consumer-centric. We will delve into how design thinking resets the product vision and how it can lead to innovative product development.

item.title: The Confluence of Roles: Deconstructing the Responsibilities of Product Managers and FDEs
item.description:
Title: The Confluence of Roles: Deconstructing the Responsibilities of Product Managers and FDEs

Introduction

The modern tech industry is becoming more complex, with specialized roles, each with defined tasks and responsibilities. Among these roles are Product Managers (PMs) and Frontend Developers (FDEs). These two are integral members of a team, whose functions may intersect at various points, leading to a confluence of roles. This blog aims to deconstruct their responsibilities, delineate their roles, and provide actionable insights for effective collaboration.

item.title: "Deciphering the Role of AI in Product Development and Management"
item.description:
Title: Deciphering the Role of AI in Product Development and Management

Introduction

Artificial Intelligence (AI) has become an integral part of our everyday lives, with applications ranging from voice assistants to self-driving cars. One area where AI’s impact is being profoundly felt is in product development and management. This blog post will delve deep into understanding the role of AI in this domain and provide actionable insights for businesses to harness its potential effectively.

item.title: "Recruiting AI Agents: The Next Big Shift in Product Management"
item.description:
Title: “Recruiting AI Agents: The Next Big Shift in Product Management”

Introduction

As we continue to traverse the digital age, the field of product management is witnessing an unprecedented shift in its operational dynamics. One of the most significant changes is the inclusion of artificial intelligence (AI). Today, AI has expanded its reach from being mere data sorting and processing bots to becoming sophisticated systems capable of decision making, learning, and interacting.

item.title: "Surviving the AI Revolution: Lessons from Builder.ai's Demise"
item.description:
Title: Surviving the AI Revolution: Lessons from Builder.ai’s Demise

Introduction

Artificial Intelligence (AI) has evolved into a disruptive force that is redefining the way industries operate. However, surviving and thriving in the AI revolution takes more than just implementing the technology; it calls for a strategic approach, as outlined by the unfortunate demise of Builder.ai. This blog will delve into the lessons learned and provide actionable insights on how businesses can survive the AI revolution.

item.title: 1. "Product Managers' Perspective: The Role of Data Centers in the AI Era"
item.description:
Title: “Product Managers’ Perspective: The Role of Data Centers in the AI Era”

Introduction:

In the era of Artificial Intelligence (AI), the role and importance of data centers have significantly escalated. With AI being widely implemented across industries, product managers are increasingly relying on data centers to deal with data volume, complexity, and security. This blog post will delve into the critical role of data centers from a product manager’s perspective, and how it helps shape the AI landscape.

item.title: 3. "The Essential Guide to Merging Project and Product Management"
item.description:
Title: “The Essential Guide to Merging Project and Product Management”

Introduction

In the dynamic world of IT, the lines between project and product management often blur. Both roles are critical to the successful delivery of an IT product or service but there is an emerging trend to merge these two vital functions. This article will explore the convergence of project and product management, the potential benefits, and how to effectively implement it within your organization.

item.title: 5. "Google's Shopping Search: A Deep Dive into its Revolutionary Impact on Fintech Product Management".
item.description:
Title: 5. “Google’s Shopping Search: A Deep Dive into its Revolutionary Impact on Fintech Product Management”

Introduction:

In the realm of technology, Google has always been a game changer, pushing the boundaries of innovation and delivering ground-breaking solutions that have reshaped our lives. One of its transformative offerings, Google Shopping Search, has been making waves in various industries, particularly in the fintech landscape. This blog post unravels the depth of Google Shopping Search’s impact on fintech product management, and how it has revolutionized the way businesses operate, create, and deliver financial services.

item.title: AI Trends in SaaS - 2025-05-24
item.description:
Title: Embracing the Future: Latest Trends in AI-Driven SaaS Platforms

Introduction

The field of Software as a Service (SaaS) has experienced exponential growth over the past few years. Primarily, this is due to the flexibility, cost-effectiveness, and ease of access it provides to businesses. However, with the advent of artificial intelligence (AI), SaaS platforms are now more powerful, efficient, and intelligent than ever before. In this post, we will delve into the latest trends in AI-driven SaaS platforms that are revolutionizing the industry.

item.title: Become the AI Product Manager
item.description:
Table of Contents

  • Introduction: From Fruit Boxes to AI - A Product Manager’s Journey
  • Chapter 1: Introduction to AI for Product Managers
  • Chapter 2: Understanding AI Prompts

Introduction: From Fruit Boxes to AI - A Product Manager’s Journey

From managing subscription boxes of fresh fruit to building SaaS products and launching AI-powered marketing analytics platforms—my journey as a Product Manager has been shaped by adaptability and curiosity.

Now, the rise of AI has redefined how we approach product management. It’s no longer just about features and roadmaps; it’s about leveraging the power of large language models, machine learning, and automation to scale faster and make smarter decisions.

item.title: Nykaa Mega Sales Conversion Optimization
item.description:
Company Background

Nykaa is a leading beauty and wellness e-commerce platform in India, offering a wide range of products from top brands. With a valuation of $6 billion and a successful IPO on the Bombay Stock Exchange, Nykaa has become a household name in the Indian market.

Project Context

In 2016, as the Head of Product and Analytics at Nykaa, I was tasked with optimizing the user journey during high-traffic Mega Sales events. During these sales, traffic typically spiked 4-5x, but we noticed a 1% drop in conversion rates.

item.title: Product Management Insights 2025-05-24
item.description:
Title: “Unlocking the Future: The Quantum Leap of Product Management in Blockchain Technology”

Introduction:

Today, the tech world is abuzz with the groundbreaking potential of blockchain technology. As a product manager, understanding the nuances of this cutting-edge technology is key to staying ahead of the curve. In this blog post, we dive deep into the fusion of product management and blockchain technology - the future of innovation and security.

Section 1: The Blockchain Revolution
